column3: Edith Bratt]], who subsequently breaks off her engagement with another man.

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1972]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] wishes J.R.R. Tolkien a happy 80th birthday in ''The Times.''
* '''[[1972]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] sends Tolkien a jar of tobacco as a birthday present.
* '''[[1992]]''' - In the centennial year, Suomen Tolkien-seura ry. (the Finnish Tolkien Society, since 2012 [[Suomen Tolkien-seura Kontu ry.]], the Finnish Tolkien Society Kontu) is founded.

January}}: Danish Tolkien Society, Imladris]] is founded.
